Posts.EditableText:
Well guy's, it's been a long time coming, but yes, I've got a new website, which, just for Ste, has a new color scheme and a new layout.  As you'd also notice, it a new URL.  I managed to secure a site at a different domain.  The fact that I've got a new domain also means transferring a lot of files, so that means some of the links are still down

Matthew G.
